author: Staff Writer - Unlimited Digital Access
title: Prince's Picks: Back these 3 NFL plays in Week 17
text: Prince's Picks: Back these 3 NFL plays in Week 17 Are you ready for BetFTW senior writer Prince J. Grimes' final picks of 2023? All 3 of Prince's Week 17 picks kick off at 1 p.m. ET Sunday with two games involving big spreads. To start off, Prince likes a double-digit home favorite in an NFC matchup featuring a team with a shot at capturing the No. 1 seed in its conference. His second pick is a double-digit road underdog in an AFC East tilt, while his final selection comes out of the Las Vegas Raiders (7-8) at Indianapolis Colts (8-7) matchup. author: Abhimanyu Kulkarni
title: Himanta Biswa Sarma, Gita Verse, Shudras Duty, "As Soon As I...": Himanta Sarma's Apology After Row Over His 'Shloka' Post
text:
Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma has apologised for the incorrect translation of a 'shloka' from the Bhagavad Gita which had created a row. Mr Sarma's post on X had landed him in the crosshairs of the Opposition with several leaders accusing him of promoting caste divisions. In his apology, Mr Sarma said that the verse had been posted on his X account by his team to keep up his tradition of sharing one Gita 'shloka' daily with his followers. "As a routine I upload one sloka of Bhagavad Gita every morning on my social media handles. Till date, I have posted 668 slokas. Recently one of my team members posted a sloka from Chapter 18 verse 44 with an incorrect translation," Mr Sarma said on Thursday. The BJP leader said he deleted the tweet as soon as he noticed the mistake. "As soon as I noticed the mistake, I promptly deleted the post. If the deleted post has offended anyone, I sincerely apologize," he said. As a routine I upload one sloka of Bhagavad Gita every morning on my social media handles. Till date, I have posted 668 slokas.
Recently one of my team members posted a sloka from Chapter 18 verse 44 with an incorrect translation.
As soon as I noticed the mistake, I promptlyâ€¦ The post which sparked a political row had incorrectly said that according to the Gita, it is the duty of the Shudras to serve the other three castes - Brahmins, Kshatriyas, and Vaishyas. Promoted Listen to the latest songs, only on JioSaavn.com All India Majlis-e-Ittehadul Muslimeen leader and Lok Sabha MP Asaduddin Owaisi had launched a sharp attack on Mr Sarma saying that he was not fulfilling his oath of treating every Indian citizen equally. "In a recently deleted post, Assam CM elaborated on his vision of society. â€œâ€¦farming, cow rearing, and commerce are natural duties of the Vaishya and serving the Brahmins, Kshatriyas and Vaishyas is the natural duty of the Shudras.â€ Holding a constitutional position, your oath is to treat every citizen equally. It's reflected in the unfortunate cruelty that Assam's Muslims have faced in the past few years. Hindutva is antithetical to Liberty, Equality, Fraternity and Justice," Mr Owaisi said on X (formerly Twitter). In a recently deleted post, Assam CM elaborated on his vision of society. â€œâ€¦farming, cow rearing, and commerce are natural duties of the Vaishya and serving the Brahmins, Kshatriyas and Vaishyas is the natural duty of the Shudras.â€
Holding a constitutional position, your oathâ€¦ Himanta Sarma in his apology post also said that Assam was the picture of a casteless society and the incorrect translation was a mistake.

author: WTVM Web Team
title: Multiple children charged in Columbus teenâ€™s drowning
text: Multiple children charged in Columbus teenâ€™s drowning COLUMBUS, Ga. (WTVM) - Several children are facing charges in the drowning of a Columbus teen. The body of Zahmere Greene, 15, was [found in a pond near the Oakland Park area ](https://www.wtvm.com/2024/06/02/officials-identify-body-found-pond-oakland-park-columbus/)on May 27, according to Muscogee County coroner Buddy Bryan. Police say their investigation indicates Greene drowned on May 23, but the incident wasnâ€™t reported until several days later. Police said the investigation also revealed that several juveniles witnessed the incident, which led to the following charges: - Juvenile, 11 years old - involuntary manslaughter and concealing the death of another - Shane Sano, 17 years old - concealing the death of another (charged as an adult, case bound over to Superior Court) - Juvenile, 11 years old - concealing the death of another - Juvenile, 11 years old - concealing the death of another - Juvenile, 9 years old - concealing the death of another - Juvenile, 12 years old - concealing the death of another According to police, the 11-year-old facing the manslaughter charge is being held in the Regional Youth Detention Center, while the 17-year-old is in the Muscogee County Jail. Authorities added that the other juveniles were processed and released to their parents. Copyright 2024 WTVM. All rights reserved.

author: Grey Papke
title: Reggie Bush receives major honor from USC
text:
Reggie Bush receives major honor from USC
The USC Trojans are finally able to honor Reggie Bush, and have quickly moved to do so now that he and his Heisman Trophy have been reinstated.
The school revealed Thursday that Bushâ€™s No. 5 is now among the retired numbers at the LA Coliseum. Former quarterback Caleb Williamsâ€™ No. 13 also joined the ranks of the retired numbers.
ðŸ‘€ðŸŸï¸âœŒï¸
[@ReggieBush] [@CALEBcsw] [pic.twitter.com/coU94a7eUg]
â€” USC Football âœŒï¸ (@uscfb)
[September 5, 2024]
Both Bush and Williams won Heisman Trophies with USC, so the decisions were a no-brainer. Bushâ€™s, however, is long overdue. He won his Heisman in 2005, but a lengthy investigation found that he had accepted improper benefits while playing for the school. That led to the program being stripped of 14 victories and Bushâ€™s Heisman being vacated, and a forced dissociation between Bush and USC. Bush
finally had his Heisman returned to him in April, partly in recognition of how much NIL rights have changed the college football landscape.
Bush remains one of the most iconic players in USC history, regardless of the penalties that had been levied against him. USC probably wishes it could have honored him this way even sooner than they did.

author: @InvCourier
title: Thousands of homes remain without power in wake of Storm Gerrit
text: Thousands of homes remain without power in wake of Storm Gerrit Published: 03:30, 29 December 2023 | Updated: 04:01, 29 December 2023 Easier access to your trusted, local news. Subscribe to a digital package and support local news publishing. Thousands of homes remain without power as the post-storm cleanup begins in the wake of Storm Gerrit. title: Lipromo retoma el proyecto para construir cien viviendas en su segunda finca de A Maestranza - La OpiniÃ³n de A CoruÃ±a
text: El proyecto inmobiliario puesto en marcha en dos de las antiguas parcelas del Ministerio de Defensa en la zona de A Maestranza da un paso adelante mÃ¡s con la presentaciÃ³n, por la empresa vasca Lipromo, del estudio de detalle para la finca que carecÃ­a hasta ahora de este documento, en el que se fijan los volÃºmenes que se podrÃ¡n construir. La edificabilidad autorizada en esa parcela permite edificar en torno a un centenar de viviendas, aunque serÃ¡ el estudio ahora en tramitaciÃ³n el que defina su nÃºmero exacto, asÃ­ como la altura del edificio. Ese terreno es uno de los tres de A Maestranza que pertenecÃ­an a Defensa y que tras perder su uso militar fueron utilizados como aparcamiento por los vecinos de la Ciudad Vieja. En 2016 el ministerio vallÃ³ las tres fincas y anunciÃ³ su subasta, aunque el hallazgo de restos arqueolÃ³gicos en ellas hizo que no se presentasen ofertas y que finalmente tuviese que recurrir a una venta directa. La alta probabilidad de que en la finca nÃºmero 3, adosada a la Sociedad Deportiva HÃ­pica, halla vestigios con valor histÃ³rico, hizo que Defensa finalmente no la vendiese y que Lipromo adquiriese las otras dos por 11,9 millones en diciembre de 2019. Tras la compra, la inmobiliaria presentÃ³ un estudio de detalle conjunto para las dos parcelas, pero la advertencia de la Xunta de que podrÃ­a haber restos arqueolÃ³gicos la animÃ³ a retirarlo y a efectuar nuevas prospecciones en el terreno. Aunque no se ha hecho pÃºblico el resultado de esos trabajos, la decisiÃ³n de la compaÃ±Ã­a de volver a presentar un estudio de detalle apunta a que finalmente recibiÃ³ autorizaciÃ³n de la DirecciÃ³n Xeral de Patrimonio para continuar la tramitaciÃ³n de este proyecto. La denominada parcela 1 se encuentra emplazada entre la avenida del Metrosidero y la calle Maestranza, con uno de sus extremos prÃ³ximos al edificio del rectorado. La nÃºmero 2 ya cuenta con su estudio de detalle aprobado por el pleno el pasado diciembre, aunque fue recurrido por la ComisiÃ³n Aberta en Defensa do ComÃºn en el Tribunal Superior de Xustiza de Galicia, que admitiÃ³ a trÃ¡mite el recurso el pasado mes de abril. Defensa do ComÃºn, que reclama el mantenimiento del carÃ¡cter pÃºblico de esta y otras propiedades de las administraciones, argumentÃ³ que los terrenos adquiridos por Lipromo son â€œespacios pÃºblicosâ€ y que su venta â€œencierra una operaciÃ³n meramente especulativa y mercantilistaâ€. El estudio de detalle de la parcela 2, situada entre la avenida del Metrosidero y la residencia militar de Atocha, prevÃ© la construcciÃ³n de un edificio con bajo y cinco alturas en el que se distribuyan 56 viviendas, todas ellas de precio libre, por lo que su ubicaciÃ³n hace prever que su valor en el mercado sea muy elevado. A pesar de la luz verde que recibiÃ³ de Patrimonio para edificar en esta finca, la empresa deberÃ¡ realizar todos los movimientos de tierras con control arqueolÃ³gico y si aparecen restos â€œpodrÃ¡n modificarse las condiciones de la autorizaciÃ³n de las obrasâ€, segÃºn le advirtiÃ³ el organismo autonÃ³mico. El edificio ocuparÃ¡ la mayor parte de la parcela y se unirÃ¡ en uno de sus extremos a otro en forma de U cuya fachada principal mira al cuartel de Atocha. En esa misma zona se retranquearÃ¡ cuatro metros con respecto a la Residencia Militar de la calle Maestranza para atender una reclamaciÃ³n de Defensa. La tercera de las parcelas de A Maestranza, que aÃºn permanece en manos del Ministerio de Defensa, fue una de las que son propiedad de ese organismo y que el Gobierno central incluyÃ³ en el lote de las que serÃ­an cedidas a los ayuntamientos para la construcciÃ³n de viviendas destinadas al alquiler asequible tras su compra por la Entidad PÃºblica de Suelos (Sepes). Aunque dos semanas antes de la celebraciÃ³n de las elecciones municipales de mayo de 2023, el Gobierno local anunciÃ³ que el Estado construirÃ­a 88 viviendas sociales entre esta parcela de A Maestranza y la que Defensa tambiÃ©n posee en la calle Adelaida Muro, el ministerio informÃ³ el pasado diciembre a este periÃ³dico que la venta de esos terrenos a la Sepes â€œno tiene calendario previstoâ€, sin que desde entonces se haya hecho ninguna comunicaciÃ³n sobre esa iniciativa. La informaciÃ³n que se proporcionÃ³ a mediados del aÃ±o pasado detallaba que la finca de la Ciudad Vieja albergarÃ­a un edificio con 77 viviendas, mientras que en la de Adelaida Muro se levantarÃ­a un inmueble con 11 viviendas.

author: Laura Hardy
title: A Record-Breaking Crowd in Detroit Proves the City Needs a Women's Hockey Team - NewsBreak
text:
Detroit
A Record-Breaking Crowd in Detroit Proves the City Needs a Womenâ€™s Hockey Team
By Laura Hardy,
1 hours agoDetroit has once again shown why itâ€™s one of Americaâ€™s best hockey towns by reclaiming its own title and setting a new U.S. attendance record for womenâ€™s professional hockey. On March 16, 2025, a crowd of 14,288 packed Little Caesars Arena to watch the Minnesota Frost take...
